comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Suwalki is a town, now in Poland, close to the northeastern part of the country, near the border with Lithuania, the exclave of Russia that used to be East Prussia, and Belarus. It was the scene of fierce Eastern Front fighting between the Russians, Austrians and Germans during the spring of 1915. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suwa%C5%82ki_Region A contemporary account: www.freefictionbooks.org/books/n/3384-the-new-york-times-... That's a pretty grim hospital...
